body: PressAndHold just allows you to type accented characters by holding down the corresponding key till the menu appears, then clicking a number, like holding down "e" and then clicking "2" to type é.
body_html: PressAndHold just allows you to type accented characters by holding down the corresponding key till the menu appears, then clicking a number, like holding down "e" and then clicking "2" to type é.

body:
Yeah I thought I'd toss that out just in case. I've only seen the pop-up on mobile.

If one were in inclined you can do some cool key mapping. When I used to write essays in French I just mapped an altgr with the normal keys.

Yeah I thought I'd toss that out just in case. I've only seen the pop-up on mobile.
